name: autumn
title: Autumn
description: Stripe made easy for AI Startups
author: xmok

preferences.name: api_key
preferences.title: Production API Key
preferences.description: Production API Key from Autumn Dashboard

preferences.name: sandbox_api_key
preferences.title: Sandbox API Key
preferences.description: Sandbox API Key from Autumn Dashboard

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
